context.rdfs:comment: When a single product is associated with multiple offers (for example, the same pair of shoes is offered by different merchants), then AggregateOffer can be used.
context.rdfs:label: AggregateOffer

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of offers for the product.
properties.rdfs:label: offerCount

properties.rdfs:comment: The lowest price of all offers available.
properties.rdfs:label: lowPrice

properties.rdfs:comment: The highest price of all offers available.
properties.rdfs:label: highPrice
